value:
Ever since I was a young'un, my
motto's been "live to play and play to
win!" Remember that before a scrap.

I grew so bored when I was reigning
khan. I had to sneak out of that drafty
castle to have some fun!

Work all you want, but don't forget to
fit fun into your schedule. If you can't
relax, you won't get very far.

Gods, but I miss my travelin' days.
A man needs spice in his life! A mug
in his hand, a lady on his arm...

I hear this world has kingdoms of ice
and fire and more. Maybe I'll get to
relive my travelin' days after all.

Good to meet you. I'm Basilio,
West-Kahn of Regna Ferox, and
friend of $Nf.

Bwaa ha ha! You whelps
got nothin' on ol' Basilio!
Watch and weep!

Bwaaa ha ha! Take a leaf out of this
book, sprogs!

Curses! But what do you expect?
I'm already perfect.
That's right! Come to Papa Basilio!

Name's Basilio, West-Khan of Regna
Ferox. But enough with formalities,
let's grab a mug and enjoy ourselves!

You need somethin'? Oh, I know!
You wanna knock back some mead
with ol' Basilio, is that it?$k$pFine by me, but we'll need some juicy
conversation. Let's see...you taken
a shine to any of the Heroes?$k$pYou mean you've never thought of
anyone that way?! Way to kill
the mood, $Nu!$k$pTake a leaf out of my book! I may be
bald and grizzled, but inside
beats the heart of a man half my age!$k$pEven Flavia can appreciate my—
Er, never mind. Forget what I said!
C'mon, bottoms up! Bwaaa ha ha!
でやっ
くらえ！
ぐあっ…
やるじゃねえか…
I still got it!
Time to cut loose!
Come on, you!
We gonna do this?
You're kidding me...
っははは！
The name's Basilio, West-Khan of Regna Ferox. Pleasure's all mine, I'm sure.
Huh? Hah! What are you, a child? Show some respect!
Lon'qu may not be the most sociable man in the army, but his bladework is second to none. Hell, he's on track to succeed me as West-Khan some day.
I'll be glad to take on any mission, no matter the odds. Better a grizzled veteran goes out in a blaze of glory! The young should live to fight again.
The West-Khans once safeguarded Gules, one of the five sacred gemstones... But it was lost long before my day.
Just point me at the enemy. I'll give those kettleheads a taste of Ferox's barbarian roots!
Hey. Leave the fighting to old Basilio. You've got the safety of the young prince Alfonse to worry about!
All right!
Fine with me.
Here goes!
